description: It installs and runs. But then it kind-of-falls apart as data columns are loaded and one tries to save work. Never did obtain a plot of any type (26 row x 2 columns). LibreCalc does better.
Uninstalled since didn't have time to look for solution on forumes.
summary: Could not connect to serial port

description: The import filter is too difficult to use or is unable to import data having the first line with a different format than the remain columns.

The lack of documentation makes it hard to use, few crucial features such us setting secondary axes, are still missing, also some options doesnt seem to work as intended - analysis & fit curves. I believe its going in good direction and hope developers will polish it a bit more, its usable but not as good as i would wish to.
summary: good, but rough at the edges

description: I've used LabPlot for a long time and it is a very good choice for free, easy to do high-quality plotting, data analysis and statistics. It is fast and stable. There is support for live data and data extraction from plots. LabPlot allows you to export your data and plots to many formats (including text, image, LaTeX, PDF, PNG and others) and to import data from text, image, SQLite, SAS, Stata, SPSS, Origin, MATLAB, HDF5, netCDF, FITS, ROOT. Absolutely no programming is required, but you can use interactive Notebooks for your favorite programming language (Python, R, Julia, Maxima, Octave etc), if you need to. Did I mention that it's free and available for Windows, Linux and macOS? Sure, there is room for improvement, but the application is in heavy development, and the development team is really responsive and friendly. Definitely worth a try!
summary: High-quality data visualization, analysis and statistics

description:
Es muy completa, pero me gustataría que tuviera la opción de obtener una función de densidad de probabilidad que mejor se ajuste a un conjunto de datos numéricos, característica que es muy importante para realizar análisis de datos y simulaciones.
Tanto el gráfico de la fdp como la fórmula de a misma serían de gran utilidad.
De igual forma estoy muy contenta con Labplot
Pas grand chose, vu qu'il n'est pas possible d'enregistrer quoique ce soit.
summary: Semble efficace et complet, mais n'enregistre pas les projets ...
